casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Mary J. AMES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017

Lauren Weisfeld, chief of legal services, in support of the petition.

Mitchell S. Brody, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn.App. 486, 157 A.3d 660, is denied.
